subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Guillermo Mota was suspended for the first 50 games of the season for violating baseball’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs. And he, and the Mets, are still paying for it.
snippet: Guillermo Mota was suspended for the first 50 games of the season for violating baseball’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs. And he, and the Mets, are still paying for it.
